1.title: Silver State Classic

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Big Red revisits the race that made it famous. Driver RJ Gottlieb is joined by original copilot Joe Pettitt, as they take on the great American road race. 90 miles of open highway through the Nevada desert at speeds over 220mph, this is one wild ride.

2.title: Big Bore Bash

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: RJ and the crew take Big Red out to their home track: Willow Springs International Raceway. Watch Big Red race fender to fender in Vintage Auto Racing against some of he finest Muscle Cars of the 60"s.

3.title: Texas Mile

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: RJ and Big Red take on a new kind of speed contest: the Flying Mile. Larry and Dave struggle to get the new "Monster Motor" ready as Big Red heads to Texas to take on the fastest cars in the country.

4.title: Virginia City Hillclimb

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The Hillclimb may be one of the oldest forms of racing in America, but it's uncharted territory for Big Red. Watch as team Big Red takes on one of the most exhilarating and dangerous races in the country in the historic mining town of Virginia City, Nevada.

5.title: Mojave Mile

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: This time Big Red is headed to a Flying Mile event closer to home. RJ and the team struggle over a 5 year span to break through the stubborn 220mph barrier that has eluded them in these events. This time they have a new trick up their sleeve.

6.title: El Mirage Dry Lake

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Big Red enters the world of Land Speed Racing in the birthplace of hot rodding on the west coast. This couldn't be further from what Big Red was built to do, but that won't stop team Big Red from pulling out all the stops and overcoming the challenges of racing on the dirt.

7.title: Bonneville Salt Flats

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Welcome to 'Hot Rod Holy Ground'. Some of the biggest names in racing have been chasing speed on this natural wonder for 100 years, now Big Red joins the fraternity. RJ and Big Red get ready to take on the legendary salt flats and try to break the record of 246mph on this incredible 5 mile straight line course.

8.title: Mojave Magnum

episode of.title: Big Red: The Original Outlaw Racer (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Already the reigning champion at the Mojave Mile, Big Red is back to stretch her legs and see what she can do at this paved 1.5 mile speed attack. With a turbo-charged Lamborghini hot on their heels, RJ and Big Red aim to stay out in front and claim the title, "fastest '69 Camaro ever!" A look back at the greatest moments from Big Red's past, out takes, "making of" and never before seen footage.

locations: Virginia City, Nevada, USA::(Virginia City Hillclimb)
Bonneville Salt Flats, Utah, USA::(Salt Flats Racing)
El Mirage, California, USA::(Dry Lake Racing)
